Detailed Description

This class is used by thermodynamic databases to decide which species they should load upon initialization.

The species list could be determined from a simple list of species names, or something more complex such as all gases containing certain elements.

Definition at line 160 of file SpeciesListDescriptor.cpp.

◆ order()

void order ( std::list< Species > &  input,
std::vector< Species > &  output,
std::vector< std::string > &  missing 
) const

Orders the species given as input in the output array.

Ensures that species explicitly listed by the user maintain the same order and that the electron is always at the beginning if it is present as a species. Condensed phase species are listed at the end of the array.
